column1: Little Goat Diner////I had a okay  experience at little goat. Me and my mom ordered 4 THINGS AND WE GOT TWO! we ordered a chicken sandwich and a tuna witch  we got both except we did not get our hot apple cider we had to ask 3 times. along with we were presented the check without our fries! So we had to take them home after the fact. i will not be coming back for dinner ill tell you that.
